title: Staff of the Emperor
content:
came before... but not everything. Touching the staff, a fragment of the Emperor's memory slithers into your brain - you see sea waves foaming into spume, and feel the explorer's exultant joy. Then the image is gone, like so much silken night under a cut-shade sun. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 190

Staff of the Emperor

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning

Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls.
